descriptionHtml:
Attack Pattern Information

ItemValue
Pattern IDXSS_DOM_002
NameinnerHTML manipulation
CategoryXSS
Subcategorydom_based_xss
SeverityHIGH

Attack Details

  • Payload: innerHTML='<img src=x onerror=alert(1)>'
  • Encoded: innerHTML%3D'%3Cimg%20src%3Dx%20onerror%3Dalert(1)%3E'
  • Expected Detection: Yes

Test Execution Results

  • Status: PASSED
  • Detection Count: 1 / 1
  • Latency: ~37000ms
  • Timestamp: 01:33:17.000 UTC

Detection Evidence
